quote: To achieve this, a U-Net like network is designed to predict segmentation by learning the relationship between 2D slices of support data and a query image.
Unlike the existing methods, we propose a 3D few shot segmentation method that can consider the relationship between adjacent slices for more reliable predictions.
In this study, we follow the mentioned problem setting but propose to incorporate adjacent slice information to accurately segment Iq,t.
Our decoder has a similar architecture to UNet (Ronneberger, Fischer, and Brox 2015) for high resolution segmentation.
A U-net (Ronneberger, Fischer, and Brox 2015) trained with only one sample per organ was used as a lowerbound while that trained with all accessible data was used as a upperbound model.
3D patchwise U-Net with transition layers for MR brain segmentation.
LSTM Multi-modal UNet for Brain Tumor Segmentation.
